description:
encoding/xml: add, support Marshaler interface

See golang.org/s/go12xml for design.

Repeat of CL 12603044, which was submitted accidentally
and then rolled back.

Fixes issue 2771.
Fixes issue 4169.
Fixes issue 5975.
Fixes issue 6125.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

The previous copy of this CL was LGTM'ed, so now that the right prereqs are
checked in, submitting this again.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7b9e2c29bf14 ***

encoding/xml: add, support Marshaler interface

See golang.org/s/go12xml for design.

Repeat of CL 12603044, which was submitted accidentally
and then rolled back.

Fixes issue 2771.
Fixes issue 4169.
Fixes issue 5975.
Fixes issue 6125.

CC=golang-dev
